content:
Deities @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Apollyon]{Apollyon}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Cyth-V'sug]{Cyth-V'sug}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Ghlaunder]{Ghlaunder}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Lady Nanbyo]{Lady Nanbyo}

Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Divine Plagues]{Divine Plagues}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Foul Miasma]{Foul Miasma}

You wield disease and pestilence like a weapon.
name: Plague Domain
